errors.formattedMessage:
Warning: "selfdestruct" has been deprecated. The underlying opcode will eventually undergo breaking changes, and its use is not recommended.
  --> contracts/SelfDestructContract.sol:14:9:
   |
14 |         selfdestruct(recipient);
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^
errors.message: "selfdestruct" has been deprecated. The underlying opcode will eventually undergo breaking changes, and its use is not recommended.

{"compiler":{"version":"0.8.20+commit.a1b79de6"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"sender","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"recipient","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"ForcedTransfer","type":"event"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address payable","name":"recipient","type":"address"}],"name":"force","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"@YamenMerhi @PatronumLabs","custom:security":"EIP-6049 deprecated selfdestruct as it may be subject to breaking changes in the future, use on your own risk","details":"Utilizes a self-destructing contract to bypass recipient limitations","events":{"ForcedTransfer(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of value that was transferred","recipient":"The address that received the forced transfer","sender":"The address that initiated the force transfer"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"force(address)":{"custom:security":"This function will always succeed, given enough gas, even if the recipient is a contract without a receive function","details":"Creates a new SelfDestructContract with the amount being sent and the specified recipient","params":{"recipient":"The address to receive the value"}}},"title":"ForceTransfer","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"ForcedTransfer(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a forced transfer is
